about_the_game:
Jans Token Pack 9 - Townsfolk Tavern


Every great fantasy adventure has a Tavern or an Inn . Think of ' The Prancing Pony ' from Lord of the Rings, ' The Leaky Cauldron ' from Harry Potter, or ' The Inn of the Last Home ' from Dragonlance.

These are places where the adventurers can relax , find rumors , and enjoy themselves . These provide great role playing opportunities .

This token pack contains:

  • 20 Unique tokens
  • 40 Color variants
  • 3x Cooks (Orc, Halfling, Human)
  • 2x Bartender (Human, Dwarf)
  • 2x Doorman/Bouncer (Orc, Human)
  • 3x Waiter (Halfling, Human, Elf)
  • 10x Patron/Customer (Human, Dwarf, Orc, Elf, Halfling)

Grab a chair, and warm yourself by the hearth fire. Meet interesting characters such as a Drow Elf waiter, have a cup of tea with a noblewoman, drink mead with a Dwarf, or have a beer with a Halfling.

Converted by: Jan Loos

Released on September 27, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
